data.prayer: Lord, like in the church of Antioch, where you gathered many prophets and teachers, please gather many prophets and teachers in the state of Tamaulipas, Mexico.
data.verse: Now in the church at Antioch there were prophets and teachers: Barnabas, Simeon called Niger, Lucius of Cyrene, Manaen (who had been brought up with Herod the tetrarch), and Saul.

data.location_label: Photo from the state of Tamaulipas, Mexico
data.section_summary: What beauty can God be thanked for in this photo?

data.prayer: Jesus, your return is closer than when we first believed. Please, set urgency in the hearts of the people living in the state of Tamaulipas.
data.verse: Besides this you know the time, that the hour has come for you to wake from sleep. For salvation is nearer to us now than when we first believed.

data.label_1: One disciple of Jesus for every 9 lost neighbors

data.prayer: Jesus, help the church in the state of Tamaulipas to not rely on buildings or programs, but on your Spirit and the simple faithfulness of every believer.
Spirit, help the 311,886 believers find a person of peace today among the 2,664,413 lost neighbors around them. And help them start discovery bible studies in these unbelieving homes.
data.verse: Suddenly a man in shining clothes stood before me and said, ‘Cornelius, God has heard your prayer and remembered your gifts to the poor. Send to Joppa for Simon who is called Peter. He is a guest in the home of Simon the tanner, who lives by the sea.’ So I sent for you immediately, and it was good of you to come. Now we are all here in the presence of God to listen to everything the Lord has commanded you to tell us.”

data.prayer: Father, I pray that the Japanese people will not be afraid or ashamed. Prevent them from being confounded or disappointed in their search for you. May the Japanese people know you.
Lord, let it be said of the 2,664,413 lost in Tamaulipas that you have called them out of darkness into your glorious light.
data.verse: But you are a chosen race, a royal priesthood, a holy nation, a people for God’s own possession, that you may proclaim the excellence of him who called you out of darkness into his marvelous light

data.prayer: Father, please raise up every one you have called in Tamaulipas, Mexico to become worthy of their calling, and offer spiritual sacrifices acceptable to you through Jesus.
data.verse: I urge you to live a life worthy of the calling you have received

data.prayer: Jesus, help the local leaders in Tamaulipas, Mexico to be faithful with what they have been given, whether a little or a lot.
data.verse: Everyone to whom much was given, of him much will be required, and from him to whom they entrusted much, they will demand the more.
